docs.title: Privacy Policy
docs.text:
Effective date: July 21, 2025 App name: Ohm's Law

This Privacy Policy explains how your information is handled while using the Ohm's Law app.

docs.title: 1. Information Collection and Use
docs.text:
The app itself does not collect any personally identifiable information. However, it integrates third-party services that may collect certain data for analytics and advertising.

These services include:

  • Google AdMob – for showing ads
  • Firebase Analytics – for tracking usage and crashes

They may collect:

  • Device type and OS version
  • IP address
  • App usage behavior
  • Approximate location

docs.title: 2. Third-Party Services
docs.text:
This app uses trusted services from Google. You can review their policies here:

  • Google AdMob Privacy Policy
  • Firebase Privacy and Security
  • Google Privacy Policy

docs.title: 3. Log Data
docs.text:
If the app crashes or encounters an error, it may send crash logs to Firebase Crashlytics. This helps improve app stability and performance.

Collected data may include:

  • Device and system info
  • Crash details and stack traces
  • Timestamp and app version

docs.title: 4. Cookies
docs.text: This app does not use cookies. However, third-party services (such as AdMob) may use technologies similar to cookies to personalize ads.

docs.title: 5. Data Security
docs.text: We do not store any personal data. All analytics or advertising data is handled by trusted third-party services, which follow industry-standard security measures.

docs.title: 6. Children's Privacy
docs.text: This app is not intended for children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided personal data, contact us immediately.

docs.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
docs.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. You will be notified by the updated date at the top of this page.

docs.title: 8. Contact Us
docs.text:
If you have any questions or concerns about this policy, feel free to reach out:

  • Email me
  • 🌐 GitHub Repository
